title: Autism, 100lbs, and How I Didn't Eat My Way Through It
itunes:title: Autism, 100lbs, and How I Didn't Eat My Way Through It
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

In today's episode I talk about autism. Our son has it and I wanted to share our journey, how I didn't gain my 100lbs back, and how learning to life coach has allowed me to teach him how to think.
